AND the trade screen should pre-load that player with the Org he belongs to (this is already happening currently)
AND additionally, the trade screen should also auto-add the initiating club to the page. 
AND the initiating club cannot remove themselves from the trade screen.
AND club can continue to build out the rest of the trade as usual and Submit it to Club

title: As a club, I want to print notice of Dispostion
As club or BOC I want to print the Assignment Agreement
As BOC, I want to see a player's service days with his current club
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Player's current club MLS is the player's MLS with the Org that is he currently associated with shown in the XX.YYY format.
- This value is also capped at 172 days per season even if player was traded during the year
- If player was with the same ORG from previous seasons, then this value is the current season service added to the previous season service with that same Org.
- Updated value should show on the Player profile service tab

title: As BOC, I want to see a day by day breakdown of player's Minor League service days
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

**AC**
In the Breakdown widget on the Service tab, add the following 4 columns. 
- MN Roster Status EOD
- Club EOD (minor league club at end of day if any)
- Mnr Service (LOP at which player got service credit)
- Mnr Day (ticks up with each day of Mnr service)

title: As BOC, I want to see a player's total MLS
custom_steps:
**AC**
- This is calculated as part of the Major League Service Batch
- Using the "Current Season Service" value, update the player's Total MLS on the service tab on his player profile and the player header.
- To get the total MLS, add the Current season MLS to Prior season MLS.
- Major League Service is displayed as "XX.YYY"; "X" is the full season year while "YYY" is the number of days in the current season. A player earns a full season by accruing 172 days of Major League Service.  For example, "1.105" means that a player have  one full year (172 days) plus 105 days of Major League Service.
- XX will increment once YYY reaches 171.  For example, if a player is at 1.171, the next value would be 2.000.

title: As BOC, I can see a day by day breakdown of player's MJ service
custom_steps:
**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

**AC**
- For all pro players, add the section "Breakdown" as per wire
- The year dropdown is set to current year. We will only start keeping breakdown history
- Table is not editable

Show table with following columns 
- Date - Show a row for every date starting from Opening day to Last day of season. Most recent on top
- MJ Roster Status EOD - MJ Roster status for the player at the end of each of those days
- MN Roster Status EOD
- Org EOD - Org of player at end of each date
- Club EOD
- MJ service - Check mark if player got service that day.  Blank otherwise
- Mnr service
- MJ Day - Start count of service day so 1st day of service would be 1, 2nd day is 2 etc.
- Mnr Day
- IL Day
- Option Day
- Outright Day

title: As a club, I want to see the names of players drafted in each pick
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- For the 2016 draft, show the roster names of the players drafted by that Club for each pick. - Also show the player's class- Additionally for the 2017 draft, populate the player names real time as the draft is in progress.- Player's name links to player profileNote:Discussion topic -  how do we handle changes in draft order and matching up the uploaded SB values

title: As a Club, I want to see the Signing Bonuses of the players that I have Signed
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- For all players listed on the widget, once their 1st yr dom contract reaches Terms Accepted, show the Actual Signing Bonus Value of the contract in the "Actual Bonus" Column- The Signing Bonus can come from either the Signing Bonus Clause or the Dual Sport Clause- Any contracts without one of these 2 clauses should show zero in that column- Show the total of these values in the footer- Additionally, populate the Signing Date column. It should link to contract- For the footer of the Signing Date column, show the total number of  rows where a Signing Date is populated

title: As a club, I want to see my Final Signing Bonus Pool
custom_steps: - The final Actual Signing bonus pool appears in the second row of the summary header- For the 'Final' row, it is calculated as the total of the "Signing Bonus Values" for rows, irrespective of NSD, which have a Signed Date (i.e. rows in black)For example:Yankees start with an Actual Signing Bonus Pool of zero. Once the draft is finished, they negotiate and sign a player drafted in a 1st round  pick with a Signing Bonus Value of 1,000,000.So the club's new Actual Signing Bonus Pool is now 1,000,000

title: As a club, I want to see my total Signing Bonuses
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- The total Signing Bonus is the total at the footer of the Amt toward Threshold column. This should also be displayed in the header summary- The Total Signing Bonuses by the R4 Draft signing deadline (system date) is shown in Row 1 of the summary. It is locked on this date-  Any changes to this value after the signing deadline are reflected in Row 2 of the summary- Additionally, once the Signing Deadline has passed, all rows that are not marked as NSD and do not yet have a contract should be greyed out

title: As a Club, I want to see my maximum Signing Bonus Pool
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**-  On the Minor Contracts dashboard, add a new tab called ‰ÛÏRule 4 Signing Bonuses‰Û￾ - Add the year toggle and default to 2017. It should default to the upcoming draft when the slot values are available in the system- Add an Org toggle. If logged in as Club, default the Org toggle to the club. If logged in as BOC, default to first Org on the list- Add the Round, Overall and Bonus Value columns.- Display all picks that the club has in the 2016 draft. Order by Overall pick number. - Each Overall pick in rounds up to and including Round 10 is assigned a Signing Bonus Value, including compensation selections, selections from the Competitive Balance Draft, etc. .- The sum of a Club's Signing Bonus Values for all of its selections up to and including Round 10 will constitute its Maximum Signing Bonus Pool.- This number is seen in the 'Totals' box at the bottom of the table as the total of "Signing Bonus Value" columnNote:- For testing purposes, I would suggest duplicating the same Signing Bonus Values for year 2017 also. The correct values will not be released until about April

title: As a club, I want to see by how much over/under that I signed the player
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- Add the Over/Under column to this widget- This shows by how much the Actual Signing Bonus on the contract varies from the Signing Bonus Value for that pick.- For rows where this is no SB value, all amounts toward Threshold are shown as over- Any zero values are shown in black- If the amount is over, show in red with a + sign- If amount is under, show in green with a - sign- Show the total at the footer. If the total is over the pool, show in red, if under show green

title: As a Club, I want to see any penalties I may have incurred from exceeding the Pool
custom_steps: **AC**- "Overage" is the club's (Total Signing Bonuses) - (Signing Bonus Pool). If this number is zero or less than zero, show as 0 (0.0%). If greater than zero, show the amount in the header summary and it's percentage value of the Signing Bonus Pool. - Also show any incurred penalties in the header summary- Calculating 'Penalty Tax'0.1% upto 9.9% , the penalty is 75% of overage value10% or greater, the penalty is 100% of overage value- Calculating Non-Monetary Penalties0% upto 4.9% - None5% upto 9.9%, show penalty as Loss of 1st round pick 10% upto 14.9%, show penalty as Loss of 1st and 2nd round picks 15% or greater, show penalty as Loss of first round picks for next 2 years

title: As BOC, I want to approve Addendum D's
custom_steps:
**Addendum D Stateflow**
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-4606+Add+D+Stateflow

**AC**
- Club can Submit the Addendum D to BOC via the submit button. This will update status to "Pending Approval" and reload the form
- Submitted Add Ds will appear on BOC clipboard for approval
- BOC can approve the Addendum D from the Clipboard or by opening the form and clicking on "Approve". This will update status to "Approved"
- BOC can also choose to "Reject" the Addendum D which moves it to Reject State. The Delete button is available in Rejected state
- Club can only edit Add D in Preliminary. BOC can edit in all states except Approved.
- BOC can attach files in "Approved State"

AND the Add C shows up black in contract history
AND blue notification appears

title: As a BOC user I want to view the PIEF List widget
custom_expected:
Wireframe: 
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_boc_widget

Acceptance Criteria: 
* As a BOC user I see a "PIEF List" tab under the "Transactions" dashboard. 
* Loading the PIEF List tab as the BOC will have the widget, per the provided wireframe. 
* All 30 Orgs will display for each year. 
*Filters covered in another story*

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit a PIEF List
custom_expected:
Wireframe: 
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_boc

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC user with edit permissions is viewing a PIEF List, regardless of if the current date is on or before the PIEF List Submission Deadline system date, then the BOC user should see an "Edit" button. 
* Clicking "Edit" will reload the screen in edit mode, per the wireframe.
* The user is able to select a Reason for the player (Extreme Fatigue, Physical Injury or Club Exemption). 
* The user is able to enter Details for the reason the player is being placed on the PIEF List. 
* The user is able to edit the Native Country field, though it should be defaulted already for them. 
* The user is able to enter a Decision for the player (Approved or Rejected).
* The user is able to enter comments via a comments bubble for their decision.  
* The user is able to delete a player's row by clicking on the trash can icon associated with the row. The trash can should only be available in edit mode, and the user needs to save changes to the form in order for the deletion to stick. 
* In edit mode, a Save button and a Cancel button are always available. 
* Clicking "Save" will save the changes made to the screen, as well as display a blue successful save notification. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the screen reloads in view mode, with no changes stored. If they do not confirm, return the user to the form in edit mode with their changes maintained. 
*Adding and removing players is covered in other stories*

title: As a Club User I want to be able to view the PIEF List
custom_expected:
Wireframe: 
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_club

Acceptance Criteria: 
* As a Club user I see a "PIEF List" tab under the "Transactions" dashboard. 
* Loading the PIEF List tab will load the current year's PIEF List for the signed in club, per the provided wireframe. 
* The "Year" defaults to the current calendar year, with prior years available for viewing (Back to 2011). 
* Clubs can only view their own PIEF Lists so Org should not be a filter for them. 
* The PIEF List Deadline on the form is the year's PIEF List Submission Deadline. 
* The Days Remaining is the number of days between the current date and the submission deadline.
* If the deadline is in the past, this should be a 0.

title: As a Club user I want to submit my PIEF list to the BOC
custom_expected:
Wireframe: 
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_club

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a Club user is viewing their Preliminary PIEF List - if they have edit permissions and the current date is on or before the PIEF List Submission Deadline, then they see a "Submit to BOC" button in edit or view mode. 
* Clicking the Submit to BOC button will store any changes made, and run a required field check.
* Once the required field check passes, the system will: 
  - Reload the form in View mode if it was previously in Edit mode.
  - Update the form's status to "Submitted"
  - Update the "Submitted" and "Submitted By" fields with the username and date that the form was submitted. 
  - Remove the "Submit to BOC" button for the form. This button can only be used in a Preliminary state, so once it has been submitted it should no longer be visible on the form. 
* BOC users should see the information for this PIEF List updated on their widget. The new status should display, along with the number of players on the form that are pending a decision.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to edit my PIEF List
custom_expected:
Wireframe: 
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_club

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a Club user with edit permissions is viewing the PIEF List for their Org, if the current date is on or before the PIEF List Submission Deadline system date, then the Club user should see an "Edit" button. 
* Clicking "Edit" will reload the screen in edit mode, per the wireframe.
* The user is able to select a Reason for the player (Extreme Fatigue, Physical Injury or Club Exemption). 
* The user is able to enter Details for the reason the player is being placed on the PIEF List. 
* The user is able to edit the Native Country field, though it should be defaulted already for them. 
* They are not able to edit the Decision or its associated comments. 
* The user is able to delete a player's row by clicking on the trash can icon associated with the row. The trash can should only be available in edit mode, and the user needs to save changes to the form in order for the deletion to stick. 
* In edit mode, a Save button and a Cancel button are always available. 
* Clicking "Save" will save the changes made to the screen, as well as display a blue successful save notification. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the screen reloads in view mode, with no changes stored. If they do not confirm, return the user to the form in edit mode with their changes maintained. 
*Adding players is covered in other stories*

title: As a Winter League Club user I want to be able to choose whether to view the homepage in English or Spanish
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=requests_-_wl_coach

Acceptance Criteria: 
* After logging into the system, there is an "English" and an "EspaÃ±ol" hyperlink at the top of the page, see wireframe for location. 
* The language currently being used is greyed out and not clickable.
* When viewing the site in English, clicking on "EspaÃ±ol" will reload the page in Spanish. The system will need to maintain this selection as the user navigates from tab to tab and form to form. 
* When viewing the site in Spanish, clicking on "English" will reload the page in English. The system will need to maintain this selection as the user navigates from tab to tab and form to form. 

Tab names in Spanish: 
 - Comunicaciá½¹n del Club (Club Communication)
 - Lista PIEF (PIEF List)
 - Lista de Reserva (Reserve List)
 - Solicitudes (Requests)

title: As a Winter League Club I want to be able to view the PIEF List in Spanish
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://gox298.axshare.com/#p=pief_list_-_wl_coach

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/PIEF+List+-+WPL+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria:
* When viewing the Winter League Portal in Spanish, there is a Lista PIEF tab available per the wireframe. 
* Clicking on the PIEF List tab will load the PIEF List in Spanish, per the data discovery and wireframe. 
* Loading the tab will load the current season's PIEF Lists by default. 
* The user will have the ability to view prior years by changing the "season" filter. 
* Only "Approved" players appear in the list. 
* The content within the PIEF List is NOT translated - only the column headers and the widget title

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Winter League Performance Report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Population%2C+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Prompts

Audience/Security: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Performance+Report+-+Audience+-+Security+-+Frequency

View Story: #157500263

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "Winter League Performance Report" is a report in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
* The category of this report should be "Pro Player Management". 
* Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with. 
* Please note the details around formatting provided at the top of the Report Details document, and the fact that the prompts allowed will vary based on the user type. 

*For QA* - This report needs to be compared with the current winter league portal version of the report. We are not building out all of the prompts at this time so we will need to discuss the best way to test/compare. We are only testing this for MLB Club/BOC users for this release.
